name: names
description:
The names command extracts all features with names from OSM data. Useful for:

- Building geocoding databases
- Creating search indexes
- Place name analysis
- Multilingual name extraction

Includes importance scoring based on feature type and metadata.

options.-f, --format: Output format: csv, json, geojson (default: csv)
options.--language: Filter by language code (e.g., en, de, fr)

output:
Named features with:
- name: Primary name
- feature_type: Category (place, highway, amenity, etc.)
- feature_value: Specific type (city, primary, restaurant, etc.)
- importance: Score 0-10 based on feature significance
- lat, lon: Coordinates
- alt_names: Alternative names (if requested)
